snippet: The warning from Secretary of State John Kerry came amid signs the Kremlin may be planning to vastly expand its support for President Bashar al-Assad of Syria.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry warns Russian foreign minister Sergei V Lavrov that reported plans by Russia to increase military support to Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad may lead to confrontation with American-led coalition; American officials maintain Russian involvement would likely escalate conflict and worsen migrant and refugee crisis.
lead_paragraph: The warning from Secretary of State John Kerry came amid signs the Kremlin may be planning to vastly expand its support for President Bashar al-Assad of Syria.

headline.main: U.S. Warns Russia Over Military Support for Assad
headline.print_headline: U.S. Objects to Russians on Activities Seen in Syria

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
